Package io.wcm.tooling.commons.packmgr.httpaction

Class BundleStatus

java.lang.Object
io.wcm.tooling.commons.packmgr.httpaction.BundleStatus
public final class BundleStatus extends Object
Wrapper for Status summary from Web Console Bundles Status info JSON.
